rfp_meta.title: REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL
rfp_meta.purpose: Samsic UK is seeking bid management and writing software to enhance tendering processes, improve efficiency, and increase contract success rates.
rfp_meta.project_description: The project involves identifying a software system that can streamline bid content creation, integrate with existing systems, and provide AI-driven content generation.

presentation_details.location: Samsic UK, Unit 2 Oak Court, Pilgrims Way, Prologis Park, Coventry, CV6 4QH
topics_to_cover: Key features and highlights of the system
Relevant case studies and client references

submission_requirements: Submit a bona fide Tender on or before the Tender return date
Manage own tender process to meet all deadlines
special_conditions: All costs incurred in preparation are irrecoverable from Samsic UK
Data must comply with UK GDPR and Data Protection Act 2018
Confidentiality of all information provided by Samsic UK
Samsic UK reserves the right to cancel or amend the RFP process
No obligation to award a contract

extracted_requirements.business_impact: Ensures seamless operation with existing infrastructure
extracted_requirements.source_section: As part of the system capabilities, we require

extracted_requirements.text: The ability to import our existing bid library
extracted_requirements.business_impact: Facilitates continuity and efficiency in bid preparation
extracted_requirements.source_section: As part of the system capabilities, we require

extracted_requirements.text: AI-driven content generation and web-based access
extracted_requirements.business_impact: Enhances content creation efficiency and accessibility
extracted_requirements.source_section: As part of the system capabilities, we require

extracted_requirements.text: 5 super user accounts (for Project Managers and Bid Managers)
extracted_requirements.business_impact: Allows key personnel to manage and oversee bid processes
extracted_requirements.source_section: As part of the system capabilities, we require

extracted_requirements.text: 10 additional users with permissions to review content and create smaller proposals
extracted_requirements.business_impact: Enables broader team collaboration and proposal creation
extracted_requirements.source_section: As part of the system capabilities, we require

extracted_requirements.text: Integration capabilities with existing tools (e.g. Microsoft Teams, Shared Drives, Salesforce)
extracted_requirements.business_impact: Ensures compatibility and enhances workflow efficiency

extracted_requirements.business_impact: Provides clarity on financial commitments and scalability

company_profile.name: Samsic UK
company_profile.overview: Samsic UK is a facilities management company known for its expertise in providing professional cleaning and security services. They have a strong focus on delivering streamlined service delivery and maintaining high service level indicators (SLIs).
company_profile.market_position: Samsic UK is recognized for its award-winning security services and high customer satisfaction, as evidenced by a 98.67% SLI score with clients like Firstsource.
recent_projects: Provided trusted cleaning and security services for Firstsource, a global outsourcing partner for Fortune 500 companies, resulting in reduced incidents and streamlined service delivery.
company_profile.additional_info: Samsic UK collaborates with organizations like SPS to optimize operations and reduce commuting and business travel through the use of Microsoft Teams.

evidence.snippet: Prior to partnering with entrust IT Group, Samsic UK had a long-term outsourced IT relationship with another Managed Service Provider. We are a leading provider of trusted facilities management services working across a range of sectors, including healthcare, corporate and education.

- Waste Management Services - See all services ## Sector Expertise Samsic UK is a national provider of Facilities Management services, trusted by commercial and institutional clients operating across a range of sectors, including Education, Retail, Industrial, Public Sector, Healthcare and Pharmaceuticals, and more. Samsic UK is nationally acclaimed and accredited by a wide range of professional bodies, putting us amongst the best cleaning and security service providers in the UK. * ### **Our Services** Samsic UK are proud to offer professional services in cleaning, reception, technical maintenance, security, facility management and landscaping. Services Samsic UK is nationally acclaimed and accredited by a wide range of professional bodies, putting us amongst the best cleaning service providers in the UK.

# Samsic UK launches integrated security operations and workforce management platform Samsic UK is launching an integrated security operations and workforce management platform after trials at Pladis Global. Its functionality ranges from paperless time and attendance reporting and payroll processing to affording clients a single view into security staffing, operations and compliance via its live dashboard. In late 2019, testing commenced of SamTech by the security and client management teams at Pladis to assess its day-to-day functionality and performance as well as the accuracy and quality of reporting capabilities. Says Samsic UK Security Director, Andrew Hallam: “Centralising management and reporting into a digitally-driven process brings cost and productivity benefits to provider and client. The technical storage or access is necessary for the legitimate purpose of storing preferences that are not requested by the subscriber or user.
We are a leading provider of trusted facilities management services working across a range of sectors, including healthcare, corporate and education.

- See all services - Security Guarding Services - Security Services When Firstsource, a global outsourcing partner for Fortune 500 companies, required trusted cleaning and security services across its UK business centres, CBRE turned to Samsic UK. Today, Firstsource enjoys 98.67% SLI scores, reduced incidents, award-winning security, and a streamlined service delivery. ###### Professional Cleaning and Security Services Samsic and its partners use your data to contact you if you fill out a form (necessary cookies for the proper functioning of the site), as well as for audience measurement, analyzing statistics of our website with the aim of optimizing it, or to offer you personalized advertising.
